channel.title: Nintendo DS on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Nintendo DS on PacoChan's Website

item.title: I have finally finished Without Escape
item.description: After five years or so, I have finally finished the damn game.

item.title: Updated the Without Escape page
item.description: I have resumed the project after a long time doing nothing with it.

item.title: SuperPong! (Nintendo DS Homebrew)
item.description: SuperPong! Is the first game I did for consoles. I started developing it for GameCube. Then I ported it to GameBoy Advance adding some features, and finally I did the definitive version for Nintendo DS.

item.title: Without Escape (Nintendo DS Homebrew)
item.description: It is a graphic adventure for Nintendo DS that mixes some touches of Resident Evil and Silent Hill. In the game you wake up because you hear some strange noises, so you decide to investigate.
